author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the global tags relevant for the 2017 UL reprocessing, as well as a fix for PPS conditions in prompt-like global tags. Both data and MC global tags are updated. It is a backport of PR #27342; further details can be found in that thread.

#### PR validation:

Please see the details in the thread for PR #27342.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is a backport of PR #27342.
title: Final global tags for 2017 UL reprocessing [10_6_X]
